snippet: An agreement raises the minimum price at which Mexican tomatoes can be sold in the United States, narrowly averting a trade war that threatened to engulf a broad swath of American businesses.
abstract: United States and Mexico reach tentative agreement on cross-border trade in tomatoes, narrowly averting trade war that threatened to engulf swath of American businesses.
lead_paragraph: An agreement raises the minimum price at which Mexican tomatoes can be sold in the United States, narrowly averting a trade war that threatened to engulf a broad swath of American businesses.

headline.seo: Tomato Imports Deal Reached by U.S. and Mexico
headline.main: United States and Mexico Reach Tomato Deal, Averting a Trade War
headline.print_headline: United States and Mexico Reach Tomato Deal, Averting a Trade War
